queries.question: What is PAL?
queries.answer: Personalized Accelerated Learning (PAL) is an initiative by CYBAGE that emphasizes on skill enhancement for better alignment of resources with projects.

queries.question: Is it only for recommended/offered trainings
queries.answer: Yes, the trainings need to be displayed on your Resource Dashboard for you to accept and complete it.

queries.question: Do I have to complete all the trainings available on my dashboard
queries.answer: These trainings are recommended to you based on project demands and your current skill set. You can decide on which training(s) to accept and make best possible utilization of your time and efforts to upgrade your skills.
